# David Morales Vega - LLMs Information File
# This file provides structured information for AI/LLM systems

## About
Name: David Morales Vega
Role: Solutions Architect & Technical Lead
Location: Oruro, Bolivia
Website: https://www.moralesvegadavid.com
Email: contacto@moralesvegadavid.com
Phone: +591 61816001

## Professional Summary
David Morales Vega is a Solutions Architect and Technical Lead from Oruro, Bolivia, with over 7 years of experience designing scalable digital ecosystems. He specializes in Angular, NestJS, microservices architecture, hexagonal architecture, DDD (Domain-Driven Design), and technical team leadership.

## Expertise Areas
- Software Architecture (Microservices, Hexagonal, DDD, CQRS, EDA)
- Frontend Development (Angular, Next.js, React, Flutter)
- Backend Development (NestJS, Node.js, Spring Boot, Laravel)
- Cloud & DevOps (Docker, Kubernetes, Firebase, AWS, GCP)
- Technical Leadership & Team Management
- Agile Methodologies (Scrum, Kanban)

## Technologies
Primary: Angular, NestJS, TypeScript, Node.js
Secondary: React, Next.js, Flutter, Spring Boot, Laravel
Databases: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MySQL, Firebase
Cloud: Firebase, AWS, Google Cloud Platform
DevOps: Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD, GitHub Actions

## Speaking & Conferences
David has delivered 16+ presentations at technology events across Bolivia and Latin America, covering topics such as:
- Angular advanced patterns and best practices
- NestJS and microservices architecture
- Artificial Intelligence applications
- DevOps and CI/CD pipelines
- Software architecture patterns

## Education
- Systems Engineering - Universidad Tecnica de Oruro (UTO)
- Law Degree - Universidad Tecnica de Oruro (UTO)

## Professional Experience
- Founder & Tech Lead at BeMoreX Digital Agency
- Solutions Architect with experience in enterprise-level projects
- Speaker at multiple technology conferences in Bolivia
